coaching.title: Coaching & Mentorship
coaching.description: One-on-one personalized coaching for women to gain clarity, confidence, leadership skills, and career direction.

programs.name: Career Clarity Program
programs.details: Helps women identify strengths, career direction, and next steps.

programs.name: Leadership Growth Program
programs.details: Focuses on leadership skills, decision-making, and professional growth.

faqs.question: What coaching is available?
faqs.answer: Iron Lady offers personalized one-on-one coaching covering career clarity, leadership growth, confidence building, and personal empowerment.

faqs.question: What courses are available?
faqs.answer: Iron Lady offers Career Clarity Program, Leadership Growth Program, and Personal Empowerment Program.

faqs.question: Who can join Iron Lady programs?
faqs.answer: Students, early career professionals, working women, and women seeking personal growth can join.

faqs.question: Is mentoring available?
faqs.answer: Yes, Iron Lady provides mentorship and guidance tailored to individual career and personal goals.

faqs.question: How to contact Iron Lady?
faqs.answer: You can contact the Iron Lady team through the official website or social media channels.
